abstract: ABC’s “Lost” delivered its highest ratings of the season on Wednesday, according to Nielsen’s estimates.
snippet: ABC’s “Lost” delivered its highest ratings of the season on Wednesday, according to Nielsen’s estimates.
lead_paragraph: ABC’s “Lost” delivered its highest ratings of the season on Wednesday, according to Nielsen’s estimates. Although the 9 p.m. show’s total viewership was a somewhat modest 11.3 million, Wednesday’s episode drew the drama’s best ratings among adults 18 to 49 since April, trailing only Fox’s “American Idol” on the night in that age group.

headline.main: Ratings: ‘Lost’ Sees Highest Ratings of the Season
